channel.title: Microsoft for Developers
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Aspire 9.4 is here with a CLI and interactive dashboard features】Aspire 9.4在这里具有CLI和互动仪表板功能
item.description: 【Today, we released .NET Aspire 9.4, our biggest release ever, bringing new integrations, interactive dashboard-based inputs, and a standalone, native AOT command line tool for creating and running Aspirified apps. We also published our first roadmap last week, which outl】今天，我们发布了.NET ASPIRE 9.4，这是我们有史以来最大的发行版，带来了新的集成，基于交互式仪表板的输入以及一个独立的本机AOT命令行工具，用于创建和运行Applesified应用程序。上周我们还发布了第一张路线图，

item.title: 【Scalable Data Governance & Compliance with UDM】可扩展的数据治理和遵守UDM
item.description: 【Why Data Governance Matters In today’s data-driven world, governance isn’t just a technical requirement—it’s foundational to successful business operations. Good governance ensures data is not only accurate and compliant but also discoverable and usable at scale. At the heart of this approach lies robust, high-quality meta】为什么数据治理在当今数据驱动的世界中很重要，治理不仅是技术要求，而且是成功的业务运营的基础。良好的治理确保数据不仅准确且合规，而且可以在大规模上发现和可用。这种方法的核心是强大的高质量元

item.title: 【Watch Live: Visual Studio Toolbox at VS LIVE! Redmond 2025】观看直播：Vs Visio Studio Toolbox in VS Live！ Redmond 2025
item.description: 【Join Robert Green and Leslie Richardson for a full day of live sessions, demos, and interviews. Live from Microsoft HQ – Stream Tuesday’s Sessions with Visual Studio Toolbox! On Tuesday, August 5, join us for a special edition of Visual Studio Toolbox Live—broadcast f】加入罗伯特·格林（Robert Green）和莱斯利·理查森（Leslie Richardson），进行一整天的现场会议，演示和访谈。来自Microsoft HQ - 流媒体工作室工具箱的流媒体周二会议！ 8月5日，星期二，加入我们，进行特别版的Visual Studio Toolbox Live -Broadcast f

item.title: 【Scaling multi-tenant Go applications: Choosing the right database partitioning approach】缩放多租户GO应用程序：选择正确的数据库分区方法
item.description: 【Multi-tenant applications face a fundamental challenge: how to efficiently store and query data for tenants of vastly different sizes? Consider the typical scenario where your platform serves both enterprise clients with hundreds of thousands of users, as well as small businesses with just a handful. With traditional database partitioning stra】多租户应用程序面临着一个基本挑战：如何有效地存储和查询大小不同的租户数据？考虑一下您平台为企业客户提供数十万用户的企业客户的典型情况，以及只有少数用户的小型企业。传统数据库分区

item.title: 【Why is there a window with no name blocking Windows shutdown?】为什么没有一个没有名称阻止窗口关闭的窗口？
item.description: 【If you try to shut down Windows, and there's a program that is not allowing the shutdown to proceed, then the Blocked Shutdown Resolver (BSDR) shows a list of windows that includes the one that is processing the shutdown notification, as well as】如果您尝试关闭Windows，并且有一个程序不允许关闭进行，则阻止的关闭解析器（BSDR）显示一个窗口的列表，其中包括正在处理关闭通知的一个窗口

item.title: 【API design note: Don't make up multiple names for the same thing】API设计注意：不要为同一件事编写多个名称
item.description: 【A recurring problem I encounter when reviewing API proposals is that teams tend not to be precise in their use of terminology. This casualness is inevitable when you work with a feature for a long time and develop notational shortcuts, but the people who are learning your API don't have the same level of familiarity that you do, and shiftin】我在审查API提案时遇到的反复出现的问题是，在使用术语时，团队往往并不精确。当您长期使用功能并发展符号捷径时，这种休闲性是不可避免的，但是正在学习您的API的人没有与您相同的熟悉程度，而是Shiftin

item.title: 【Azure Developer CLI (azd) - July 2025】Azure开发人员CLI（AZD） - 2025年7月
item.description: 【This post shares the details of the latest changes to the Azure Developer CLI (azd) in release 1.17.1 and 1.18.0. We invite you to join our July release discussion on GitHub with questions and comments. This month's release focuses on enhancing developer experien】这篇文章分享了版本1.17.1和1.18.0中Azure开发人员CLI（AZD）的最新更改的详细信息。我们邀请您加入我们在Github上的7月发布讨论，并提出问题和评论。本月的发布重点是增强开发人员体验

item.title: 【Azure Container Options: Matching Services to Operational Responsibility】Azure容器选项：将服务与运营责任相匹配
item.description: 【Customers are looking to modernize their application on cloud and ask us for guidance on which Azure container services to choose. Should you choose A or B container services or A+B container services? Some choose both (A + B) or use A or B appr】客户希望在云上现代化其应用程序，并向我们询问选择哪种Azure容器服务的指导。您是否应该选择A或B容器服务或A+B容器服务？有些选择同时选择（a + b）或使用A或B ADPER

item.title: 【Microsoft build of Go 1.25 crypto backend changes】Microsoft构建GO 1.25加密后端更改
item.description: 【Starting in Go 1.25, the Microsoft build of Go will default to using system-provided cryptography: OpenSSL on Linux and CNG on Windows. The systemcrypto GOEXPERIMENT will be enabled by default and picks the supported backend for the target platform.】从GO 1.25开始，GO的Microsoft构建将默认为使用System提供的密码学：Linux上的OpenSSL和Windows上的CNG。默认情况下将启用SystemCrypto Gosperiment，并为目标平台选择支持的后端。

item.title: 【Let’s Learn MCP Series Recap: 8 Languages, 4 Code Bases, Full Resources】让我们学习MCP系列回顾：8种语言，4个代码库，完整资源
item.description: 【The Model Context Protocol (MCP) has quickly established itself as the go-to standard for seamlessly connecting AI agents with a variety of external tools and services. In just a few months, it has become a prominent topic at developer events and forums, gaining adoption from companies of all sizes. To meet the rapid pace of advancements, we】模型上下文协议（MCP）已迅速确定自己是无缝连接AI代理和各种外部工具和服务的首选标准。在短短几个月内，它已成为开发人员活动和论坛上的一个杰出话题，从各种规模的公司中获得了收养。为了达到进步的快速步伐，我们
